item.title: Binary Obfuscation
item.description: The main aim of Binary Obfuscation is to hinder the process of static analysis of a binary.Â Renaming the symbols(variables and functions) of a binary implies that the clues as to what data a variable holds or what task a function performs that could be obtained from their names, are lost. This makes it a little harder for the analysts to keep a track of all the symbols without documenting them.
